title: Client thinks i am in a game, when im not
body: Logged onto this account after a few months. The client still thinks i am in a game and only has reconnect. ? Tried clicking reconncct but error occurs saying i cant connect to server. Then i try cancel, then it re opens the client with only the button reconnct.

replies.body:
I'd suggest reaching out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you have the chance. From what you're explaining, it sounds like someone else was using your account when you logged in. They were in a game, but you kicked them offline when logging in, which is why you saw a reconnect option. 

Our account agents will be able to verify you as the original creator and help make sure nobody else has access to your account.
